description: This file contains TypeScript code for an AngularJS-based TodoMVC application, including class definitions, directives, services, and the main module setup.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: Class representing a Todo item with title and completion status.

classes.name: TodoStorage
classes.description: Service that persists and retrieves TODOs from localStorage.

classes.name: TodoCtrl
classes.description: Main controller managing TODO list, user interactions, and data persistence.

methods.name: todoFocus
methods.description: Directive that places focus on the element when the bound expression evaluates to true.

methods.name: todoBlur
methods.description: Directive that executes an expression when the element loses focus.

methods.name: todoEscape
methods.description: Directive that cancels editing a todo when the Esc key is pressed.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Method in TodoStorage that retrieves TODOs from localStorage.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Method in TodoStorage that saves TODOs to localStorage.

methods.name: onPath
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that updates filter based on URL path.

methods.name: onTodos
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that updates counts and saves current TODOs.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that adds a new TODO item.

methods.name: editTodo
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that initiates editing a TODO item.

methods.name: revertEdits
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that reverts changes to a TODO item.

methods.name: doneEditing
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that finalizes editing a TODO item.

methods.name: removeTodo
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that removes a TODO item.

methods.name: clearDoneTodos
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that clears completed TODOs.

methods.name: markAll
methods.description: Method in TodoCtrl that marks all TODOs as completed or not.
